channel.title: jsdoc on NoizBuster
channel.description: Recent content in jsdoc on NoizBuster

item.title: Javascript Documentation
item.description: 2016년 가장 널리 사용되는 javascript documentation 은 jsdoc이다. http://usejsdoc.org/ https://github.com/jsdoc3/jsdoc https://meteor.hackpad.com/Automatically-Generating-API-Docs-using-JSDoc-EpPmd2iuFEH#:h=Example:-Class 랜더링 툴은 https://www.npmjs.com/package/jsdoc-to-markdown https://github.com/docstrap/docstrap https://github.com/DBCDK/jsdoc3Template https://github.com/clenemt/docdash https://github.com/kbknapp/clap-rs http://jaguarjs.com/doc/ doc dash가 젤 이뻐보인다.
